pullrequest.title: Fix for the spawning light issue

content.raw:
Can you add the comment below to explain the reason for this change:

`The light need to be added to the list on Load (before Init) for the case when a model is created from a factory message. Otherwise the model msg published to the client will not contain an entry of this light`
content.html:
Can you add the comment below to explain the reason for this change:

The light need to be added to the list on Load (before Init) for the case when a model is created from a factory message. Otherwise the model msg published to the client will not contain an entry of this light
